channel.title: Gauntlet Video Roundup Announcement - October 25, 2019
channel.description:
Greetings, all! [This week's Gauntlet Hangouts video roundup post](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/blog/gauntlet-video-roundup-october-25-2019) is now up on The Gauntlet Blog!
Check out the week's collection of recorded actual play, plus keep up with game, panel, and workship videos coming out of Gauntlet Con! Thanks to everyone who facilitated and played, and if you want to join in the fun, head over to the [Gauntlet Hangouts category](https://discourse.funtimers.club/c/gauntlet-hangouts) on the Forums to see the latest game announcements, and sign up on the [Gauntlet Hangouts Calendar](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/) to play!
